name: ROBOT KLAUS: an adventure in the past
name_original: ROBOT KLAUS: an adventure in the past
description:
Play as a robot from the future on a mission in the prehistoric past, project created for the global game jam 2022

Instructions:

1- download the game and unzip

2-click on the executable

3- W, A, S, D to walk, R to reload, left mouse click to shoot, right mouse click to change aim
